entityname.bathroomlarge_et_ltt:
Family Restroom
Click to select and then place the family restroom. They cost more than small restrooms, but accommodate six more guests.
entityname.bathroomsmall_et_ltt:
Small Restroom
Click to select and then place the small restroom, which can accommodate one guest at a time.
entityname.foodstand_burger_et_ltt:
Hamburger Food Stand
Click to select and then place the hamburger food stand. Hamburgers are reasonably priced and reasonably filling.
entityname.foodstand_hotdog_et_ltt:
Hot Dog Food Stand
Click to select and then place the hot dog food stand. Especially popular with kids, hot dogs are a classic American food.
entityname.foodstand_salad_et_ltt:
Salad Food Stand
Click to select and then place the salad food stand. Kids usually don't like salads, but adults love them.
entityname.foodstand_soda_et_ltt:
Soda Drink Stand
Click to select and then place the soda drink stand. Sodas are the most popular drink among most zoo guests.
entityname.foodstand_sub_et_ltt:
Sub Food Stand
Click to select and then place the sub food stand. Subs are meat-filled sandwiches that are commonly devoured for lunch.
entityname.foodstand_sushi_et_ltt:
Sushi Food Stand
Click to select and then place the sushi food stand. An expensive food choice, sushi is more popular with adults than kids.
entityname.foodstand_water_et_ltt:
Water Drink Stand
Click to select and then place the water drink stand. Water will satisfy your guests' most basic thirst needs.
entityname.foodstand_shishkabob_et_ltt:
Shish Kebab Food Stand
Click to select and then place the shish kebab food stand, which offers protein-rich food at a reasonable price.
entityname.foodstand_coffee_et_ltt:
Coffee Drink Stand
Click to select and then place the coffee drink stand. Adult guests love the caffeine jolt, and some younger guests are willing to try it, too.
entityname.snackcart_cheesecake_et_ltt:
Cheesecake Cart
Click to select and then place the cheesecake cart. Adult guests love cheesecake for dessert.
entityname.snackcart_popcorn_et_ltt:
Popcorn Cart
Click to select and then place the popcorn cart. Popcorn is a filling snack that may make your guests thirsty.
entityname.snackcart_pretzel_et_ltt:
Pretzel Cart
Click to select and then place the pretzel cart. Pretzels may make guests thirsty.
entityname.snackcart_cottoncandy_et_ltt:
Cotton Candy Cart
Click to select and then place the cotton candy cart. Cotton candy is a classic kids' treat.
entityname.snackcart_fruitcup_et_ltt:
Fruit Cup Cart
Click to select and then place the fruit cup cart. Many guests enjoy fruit as a healthy snack alternative.
entityname.snackcart_icecream_et_ltt:
Ice Cream Cart
Click to select and then place the ice cream cart, a big favorite with young zoo guests.
entityname.bench_et_ltt:
Desert Bench
Click to select and then place a desert-themed bench. Guests enjoy visiting themed areas in your zoo.
entityname.DonationBox_et_ltt:
Desert Donation Box
Click to select and then place the desert-themed donation box. Guests won't donate money if they can't find a donation box, so place them all over your zoo.
entityname.umbrellatable_et_ltt:
Desert Umbrella Table
Click to select and then place a desert-themed umbrella table, which provides guests with a shaded place to rest and eat.
entityname.ViewingArea_et_ltt:
Desert Viewing Canopy
Click to select and then place the desert-themed viewing canopy, which allows guests to view animals in shaded comfort.
entityname.lamp_et_ltt:
Desert Lamp Post
Click to select and then place a desert-themed lamp post. Guests enjoy visiting themed areas in your zoo.
entityname.trashcan_et_ltt:
Desert Trash Can
Click to select and then place a desert-themed trash can. Trash cans should be placed all over your zoo so that guests can dispose of their garbage.
entityname.Statue_et_ltt:
Desert Statue
Click to select and then place a desert-themed statue. Guests appreciate the beauty of a well-placed statue.
entityname.PathArch_et_ltt:
Desert Arch
Click to select and then place the desert-themed arch, which can be an attractive addition to paths or entrances to themed areas in your zoo.
entityname.Fountain_et_ltt:
Desert Fountain
Click to select and then place a desert-themed fountain. Guests appreciate the beauty of a well-placed fountain.
entityname.MusicalRock_et_ltt:
Desert Music Rock
Click to select and then place a desert-themed music rock, which plays music from speakers hidden inside of it.
entityname.desertfence_ltt:
Desert Fence
Click to select and then place sections of desert fence. Guests enjoy visiting themed areas in your zoo.
entityname.lowdesert_ltt:
Low Desert Fence
Click to select and then place sections of low desert fence. Guests enjoy visiting themed areas in your zoo.
entityname.desertwindow_ltt:
Desert Window Fence
Click to select and then place sections of desert window fence. Guests enjoy visiting themed areas in your zoo.
entityname.desert_ltt:
Desert Path
Click to select and then place sections of desert-themed path. Guests enjoy visiting themed areas in your zoo.

cell.color:
Fencing that reflects a desert theme is best used when building exhibits for desert animals, such as camels.
You can also use desert fencing to create themed public areas adjacent to desert exhibits. Guests appreciate visiting themed areas.

Fencing that reflects a desert theme is best used when building exhibits for desert animals, such as camels.
You can also use desert fencing to create themed public areas adjacent to desert exhibits. Guests appreciate visiting themed areas.

Fencing that reflects a desert theme is best used when building exhibits for desert animals, such as camels.
You can also use desert fencing to create themed public areas adjacent to desert exhibits. Guests appreciate visiting themed areas.
